pma:database.name: db_scriptforte
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `class` ( `class_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `class_staff` int(11) NOT NULL, `class_grade` int(2) NOT NULL, `class_section` char(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Class section per grade', PRIMARY KEY (`class_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3966 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COMMENT='Collection of classes of the school';

CREATE TABLE `performance_data` ( `pf_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'Student performance entry ID', `pf_userID` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ID of the student', `pf_username` varchar(30) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Username of the test taker', `pf_testID` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ID of the course.', `pf_testMode` tinytext NOT NULL COMMENT 'Contians pre-test and post-test modes achieved by the user', `pf_rating` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Student rating to the course.', `pf_timestamp` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`pf_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=16 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COMMENT='Performance data of each users that finishes the game.';

CREATE TABLE `staffs` ( `staff_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `staff_fname` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `staff_mname` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `staff_lname` varchar(80) NOT NULL, `staff_birthdate` date NOT NULL, `staff_address` varchar(150) NOT NULL, `staff_organization` varchar(150) NOT NULL, `staff_position` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `staff_username` varchar(30) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Unique user names', `staff_password` char(60) NOT NULL, `staff_accountLevel` int(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`staff_ID`), UNIQUE KEY `staff_username` (`staff_username`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2003 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COMMENT='Composed of school''s staffs and teachers';

CREATE TABLE `students` ( `student_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `student_fname` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `student_mname` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `student_lname` varchar(80) NOT NULL, `student_birthdate` date NOT NULL, `student_address` varchar(150) NOT NULL, `student_classID` int(11) NOT NULL, `student_username` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `student_password` char(60) NOT NULL, `student_accountLevel` int(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`student_ID`), UNIQUE KEY `student_username` (`student_username`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1056 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COMMENT='Registered students';

CREATE TABLE `tests` ( `test_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'Test entry ID', `test_staffAuthor` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Author of the Test', `test_name` text NOT NULL COMMENT 'Name of the test', `test_type` tinytext NOT NULL COMMENT 'Type of test (Post-test, Pre-test)', PRIMARY KEY (`test_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=27 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COMMENT='Entry of pre-tests and post-tests';
